div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxiiij de nouembris
anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne talyour in the gallougate grantit and oblist him be the
fatht of his bodie to pay to Androu michelsone cordonar ane chaldir
of bark sufficient merchand gude in the first boyt cumand' about fra murray
betuix this and pasche next to cum and the said Androw sal gif him tuenty
schillingis in tyme of the cumin of the said boit of the rest of the pament
of the said bark

The saide day Williame lammyntone was conuikit be ane assis' thomas
prat forspekar for the forstallinge of the burghe In byinge of cow
et cetera

The said day the said William was conuikit be the said assis'
for the brekin of ane rest entromettand' with the said Cow

The said day Will blitht eldar conuikit for the wranguis' art and part
of the forstallinge and byinge of the said cow

The saide day William lammyntone was oblist be his hand to
Stand at the ordinance of the assis' for the saide offence
and thai ordanit him to gif ij li' vax to the haly blud licht
and v s' to the kirk werk And gif euire he committis sic offence
In tyme to Cum he salbe Secludit his craft ane yer'

The saide day Androw muresone was in Ane amerciament of the
court for the wranguis' haldin of xvij s' and viij d' fra Wat
atkin procurator to dene nichol Sclugy be ane assis' thomas
Symsone forspekar quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay
within terme of law

Curia Be It kende Till all men be thir present lettres ws Al
dirman bailyeis consall and communite of Aberdene To Haue Sett and
to maill lattin Ande be thir present lettres Settis and to maill lattis to our
louet Williame buchane baxtar our' nichbour' all and haill our
nethir myll with the pertinence for all the termes of fyftene yeris
To be Haldin and hade all and haill our' saide myll with the pertinentis to
the said William ande his assignez ane and may nay gretar thane
Him Self Induellaris of the saide burgh' thar subtennentis and
helpis with all and Sindre multuris fredomes commoditeis asiamentis
ande profytis pertening or may pertene tharto The Entre of the said'
William was In and with the said' myll at Witsonday next and Imme
diat gangand' befor the dait of thir lettres Ande frathinfurth'
to continewe in peciable' Josin and breuking the samyn quhill the
termez of fyftene haill and to giddir' be fullely Complet and runnyn
but ony Interrupcion' or brek of termes or yeris Impediment or
demavnd' the saide William his assignez subtennentis or helpis
payand' yerlie to our' commone clerk for the tyme tene merkis
vsuall money of Scotland' of maill at the termes eftir follouing
that Is to say fyw merkis at martimes in wynter next eftir follouing
the dait of thir lettres Ande wyn fywe merkis at Witsonday next
and Immediat thareftir follouing And suafurth' termelie at Ilkane of
the saide tua termis fiwe merkis quhill the termes of fiftene yeris haile'
and to giddir be fullelie complet ande runnyn Allanerly for all vthir
thingis that may be askeit of Requirit tharof Induring the saide
termes Ande atour the said William and assignez sall big vp mak
ande vphalde the saide myll deulie Ande leyf hir weill So
ueralie and trastlie biggit at the vschew of the saide termes
be the sich ande consideracione of the Aldirman and consall for the tyme
Ande we the saidez Aldirman bailyeis consall and communite sall warand'
kep and defend' all and haill' our' said' myll with the pertinence to the
said' William and his assignez subtennentis and he hois for all the
termes of seene yeris as said' Is agannis all deidlie all fraude
And gill avayput In witnessing of the gill quhilkis we haue
appensit our commone Sell to thir lettres At Abirdene the
tuenty Sevint day of October the yer of god ane thou
sand' four hundretht nyntj and four yeris

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis nouembris anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quarto quo supra

Eodem die Elizibeth' byssat in amerciamento Curie per assisam ex ore
thome Symsone pro perturbio Elizibeth' blinsele cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt Insuper deliberare fuit per dictam assisam
cum quod dicta Elizibeth' byssat soluet eidem Elizibeth' blinsele
ij s' pro delicto commisso Et se in postrum conuicta pro perturbio
fuerit intrabit personam suam in Collistrigio Ibidem per xxiiij
horas continue remansur' alioquin Soluet fabrice beati nicho
laij quadraginta solidos Et hoc de consensu et obligacione parcium
assise obligat' in premissis ascand'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Alexander forbes in Schipraw amerciatur per assisam Juratam
ex ore Alexandri chamer Junioris prelocutoris eiusdem pro iniusta intromissione Jonete curtyar'
famule j thome hatmakar' ac pro perturbio vxoris dicti thome
quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio xijo
die mensis Decembris anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quarto

head.seg: The falsing of Ane dome the
head.note: This heading is located above the court heading (ARO-7-0591-01).

div.p:
The said day comperit Androu murray eldar burges of Abirdene
Ande saide / sere balyeis forsamekile as It is Cumin to my knaulege
that thar was gevin befor you in ane pretendit Court of youris haldin
in the tolbutht of the saide burghe' the xxj day of nouember last bipassit
ane pretendit dome agannis me for Dauid menyeis burges and aldirman
for the tyme be the moutht of Jonhne Williamsone pretendit dempstar
of the said pretendit Courte tuechinge the redempcion' of ane half nethis
fischingis of the furdis of the wattir of Dee for the Some of lxxx
li' vsuale money of Scotlande as at mair' lintht is contenit in
the pretendit borghe' ande process' deducit tharapone The quhilk dome
thus gevin Contrar me is evile gevin ande fals in It Self becaus'
It was gevin at the Instance of the saide Dauid contrar' the law
he nothir prevand be writ nor lauchfull document nor lauchfull witnes
ony thing Contrar' me protestand for many resonnis to gif in for
my defence in the said matir quhene and quhar' it efferis Ande herapon
philp Dunbrek officiar and sergeand of this Court I finde and borghe
In your hand Ande askis at yow sere Jonhne Stiruelinge
notar and clerk of this Court Instrument tharapone Ande to follow and
persew the falsing of the said dome the saide Androu murray oblist
and band' him be his landis and gudis his hande vphaldin in
the best and Souerast forme according to Our' Souerane lordis lavis
befor the Juge quhome It efferis day and place according tharto
befor thir witnes Johne Cullane Johne Colisone Dauid mar' Alexander gray
Adam Cullane Richerd Waus' Androw nachty henry with vthir diuers'
and askit the copy of the process' gangand obefor'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xv die mensis Decembris Anno Domini et nonagesimo quarto ut supra

head.add: Joneta quhit margareta quhit et mariota quhit et cetera

div.head:
Inquisicio breuium Jonete quhit mariote quhit
et margarete quhit
div.p:
Johannes Culane Alexander mar' Andreas Culane senior Willelmus blinsel
Dauid mar' thomas Symsone Johannes fechat senior Andreas mureson'
thomas rolland Walterus atkin patricius Rede Willelmus gray et
thomas menyeis burgensis dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Thomas quhit
patrius margarete quhit Jonete quhit and mariote quhit latricum
presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini
nostri Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico nauium
ex occidentali australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Andree branche ex australi
ex vna et terram thome prat ex boreali partibus ab altera Et quod dicte marga
reta Joneta et mariota sunt legittime et propinquiores heredes dicti quondam
thome patruj suj de dicta terra et quod sunt legittime etatis Et quod valet
per annum vj s' et viij d' Et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenetur
in capite de Suppremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis per tres menses
aut eocirca in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis

Eodem die Johannes rede Junior amerciatur pro perturbio Johannis bogy et vxoris
sue Et Johannes Webstar amerciatur pro perturbio eorundem quibus emendabunt
ut iura volunt Et dictus Johannes bogy et vxor sua pro perturbio
dictorum Johannis et Johannis amerciatur per assisam ex ore Johannis Culan quilibet
emendabunt in Jura volunt

Eodem die Walterus atkin amerciatur ex proprie lingue confessione pro iniusta
recepcione clauium matris sue et domus se racione et cetera

div.head: Waus
div.p:
Eodem die Johannes in futy amerciatur pro perturbio Roberti matheson' cuj
emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas Waus deuenit plegius legalis per manus ostencionem quod
Robertus mathei erit Indempnis pro Johanne Waus et parte sua aliter quam per
viam Juris Et Andreas muresone deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Johannes erit Indempnis pro predicto Roberto et parte sua aliter quam per
viam iuris Et quilibet dictarum parcium obligatoris ad conseruandum
plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Johannes Waus in futy deuenit plegius et fideiussor
per manus ostencionem ad conseruandum Andream muresone Indempnem pro
xvij s' et vj d' monete scocie recept' per Walterum atkin ab eo alias
arrest' ad instanciam Sponse Johannis blak Et Idem Walterus
obligauit se per manus ostencionem ad releuandum dictum Johannem
Waus de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xx die
mensis Decembris anno quo supra

The saide day It was statut and ordanit be the Consale that
the baxtaris sale bak ij penny breide gude and clene Stuf
fresche and weile bakin contening xxxvj vnce and penny brede
contening xviij vnce

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xxiij die mensis Decembris anno quo supra

the saide day Androw murray eldar present certane allegeance and resonis
closit vndir his Seill tuechinge the agane callit of the dome
that he agancallit anent the borghe' fundin be Dauid menyes
apone him quhilkis sere Jonhne Stiruelinge clerk of the
court resauit and laide thame in the common kyst

die mensis Decembris anno quo supra Dauid menyes prepositus
fecit constituit creauit et ordinavit Alexandrum menyes gilbertum menyes
et Willelmum blinsele coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad
obiciendum et excipiendum contra breuia Inquisicionis Capelle regie
alias Impetrat' per Richardum grige et cetera agend' prosequend' et defendend'
In vberiore forma procuratorij promitten' de Rato et grato

The last day of December' the ballieis with avis' of the Consal
chargit and warnit ale the baxtaris to furnis' and provide tham
for gude Stuffis In breide of quhet the ij d' breide conte
ning xxxij vnce cleyne and weilbakin to serue our Soueran
lordis and the lordis ande the tone vndir the payne of law
Ande als' vndir the payne of Secludinge of tham fra
the Craft for yer' and day

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
secundo die Januarij anno quo supra

Eodem die Elizibeth' gordone domina de barnis nomine et ex
parte henrici leith' filij suj domini de barnys fecit constituit creauit
et ordinauit thomam prat Johannem Wormet et patricium leslie
coniunctim et divisim suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum communia preposito
et ballivis per legittimos processus omnes et Singulas terras vastas
de quibus aliquos annuos redditus tenentur habere vsque ad
legittimam recuperacionem earundem secundum formam Juris Ipsummet patricium
ad petendum exigendum leuandum et recipiendum vniuersos annuos red
ditus sibj debit' et de receptis acquitand' Agend' defendend'
distringend' In vberiore forma procuratorij promitten' de Rato
et Rato grato

Eodem die Adam Ruthurfurd in Amerciamento Curie pro iniusta detencione
equj a Johanne ruthirfurd' milite cuj restituet eundem aut
valorem infra terminum Juris per assisam Juratam ex ore Alexandri chamer

Eodem die Willelmus lintone amerciatur pro perturbio Willelmj lint seriandis
philippi Dunbrek et Idem Willelmus in Amerciamento curie
pro disobediencia henrici Orvm sergeandi in excercione
suj officij quibus emendabit ut iura volunt per assisam
Juratam ex ore Alexander chamer de murchill

the samyn day Jonhne ramsay protestit for ij s' Ilkan day
for his seruand' gif he beis fundin havand resone to him

Walterus gareauche amerciatur pro perturbio Relicte quondam Alexandri ranison'
et eadem amerciatur pro perturbio dicti Walteri et quilibet ipsorum emendabit
ut Jura volunt

xxiijo die Januarij Elizibeth' domina de barnis nomine henricj leche
filij suj domini de barnis fecit constituit nominauit et ordinavit thomam prat
magistrum Alexandrum gordone et Jacobum colisone coniunctim et divisim suos
legittimos procuratores actores factores et nuncios speciales ad prosequendum et
calumpniandum Jacobum crak pro occupacione croftorum suorum agend' defendend'
ac in omnibus alijs suis actionibus promitten' de rato et grato in vberiore
forma procuratorij cum omnibus clausulis necessarijs et oportunis Testibus patricio
leslie et Dauid liall
